title: 插件自动升级提示
author: jin7568866
txt_content:
Damage Indicators was unable to check for updates!
这个是哪个插件？这个经常看到

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 我就修改一下楼上的回答  Damage Indicators 不是插件 是MOD = = 所以你可以无视这条无法更新的提示别人卡不见的

replies.author: 迷途的村庄
replies.txt_content:
伤害显示插件http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-398894-1-1.html
unable to check for updates!=无法检查更新!
